Package SSG_Tools.SSG_Nodes.Groups.Transforms

Class Summary
MatrixTransform Instances of this class are Group nodes that transform their children using multiplication by a specified 4x4 matrix.
OrientationTransform This class represents transformation nodes that both "rotate" an object to align it's x and y axes to specified "base" and "up" directions AND translates the "center" of the object to a specified position.
Rotate Instances of this class are Group nodes that transform their children using rotation by a specified angle around a specified 3D axis.
Scale Instances of this class are Group nodes that transform their children using scaling by specified scale factors in the x, y and z directions.
TransformGroup This is the abstract base class for group nodes that apply a transformation BEFORE rendering their child nodes.
Translate This class implements Group nodes that transform their children using translation by a specified 3D vector.
